mapper.select: select m.*, u.nick, u.thumb, d.dsno from memos m, users u, lcts l, dsbd d where m.uno = u.uno and l.cid = m.cid and d.uno = u.uno and l.cid = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into memos (uno,cid,cont,regd) values((select uno from dsbd where dsno = #{dsno}),#{cid},#{content},now())
mapper.select: select distinct s.uno, r.rno from routes r , scdls s, memos m where r.cid = #{cid} and r.SDNO = s.SDNO and m.UNO != s.UNO and m.CID and r.CID and date_format(regd, '%Y-%M-%D') between date_format(now() - interval 1 day, '%Y-%M-%D') and date_format(now(), '%Y-%M-%D') and m.UNO != s.UNO
select * from malm where rno in (${value})
